comprehensive_overview: Shasta is a long-read assembler designed for PacBio and Oxford Nanopore data. It efficiently assembles long noisy reads into highly accurate contigs and is optimized for high error rates commonly found in third-generation sequencing technologies.
core_features: Optimized for long noisy reads from PacBio and Oxford Nanopore technologies
Handles high error rates commonly found in third-generation sequencing data
